scripts.bootstrap: npx lerna bootstrap --no-ci && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run test:clean && npm run demo:clean && npm run build:clean && npm run perf:clean && lerna clean --yes
scripts.publish: npm run test && npm run build:prod && lerna publish
scripts.start: npm run bootstrap && npm run demo
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap
scripts.test: npm run types:ts:check && npm run test:clean && npm run test:run
scripts.test:ci: npm run types:ts:check && npm run test:clean:ci && npm run test:run:ci
scripts.demo: npm run demo:clean && cd demo && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel index.html --port 1210
scripts.build: npm run types:ts:build && npm run build:lib
scripts.build:watch: cross-env REALAR_DEV=true npm run build && chokidar "lib/**" -c "cross-env REALAR_DEV=true npm run build"
scripts.perf:realar: cd perf/realar && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel index.html --port 1200
scripts.perf:mobx: cd perf/mobx && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel index.html --port 1201
scripts.perf: npm run perf:clean && concurrently --kill-others "npm run perf:realar" "npm run perf:mobx"
scripts.types:ts:build:watch: npm run types:ts:build && chokidar "lib/**/*.ts" -c "npm run types:ts:build"
